name: Steel Love: Failed Sumbission
description:
A half-finished entry for the Robot Party game jam that wasn't submitted on time (https://itch.io/jam/robot-party-jam-2022).

There IS a double jump. There IS an attack combo. I can be happy with at least that much. Yes, the misspelling is an intended joke that I don't think works.

Mouse required for dialogue parts, but gamepad works in general:

ESC - Pause/Quit

Mouse click: Attack/Advance dialogue
